Issue No. 5~Jurisdiction of the District Court

column2: As  I have stated above Issue No.5 adverted to the jurisdiction of the District Court of

column1: Colombo having regard to the locus of the land which is the subject-matter of the action.
The argument of Mr.  Chula Bandara for  the Plaintiff-Appellants was that as  the head
office  of  the  2nd  Defendant  People's  Bank  was  in  Colombo,
instituted within the local limits of the jurisdiction of the District Court of Colombo.
